query.mssql: create table {0} ([RowIndex] int NOT NULL, [ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [Department] int NOT NULL, [Unwrap] bit NOT NULL, [DepartmentName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [IsActiveDepartment] bit NOT NULL, [SubDepartmentName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [IsActiveSubDepartment] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [HyperlinkBusinessUnitId] int NOT NULL, [BusinessUnitName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [AssignmentCompletion] int NULL, [AssignmentsCount] int NOT NULL, [AffectDisciplineAssignmentsCount] int NOT NULL, [CompletedInTimeAssignmentsCount] int NOT NULL, [OverdueAssignmentsCount] int NOT NULL )
query.postgres: create table {0} (RowIndex int NOT NULL, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, Department int NOT NULL, Unwrap boolean NOT NULL, DepartmentName citext NOT NULL, IsActiveDepartment boolean NOT NULL, SubDepartmentName citext NOT NULL, IsActiveSubDepartment boolean NOT NULL, HyperlinkBusinessUnitId int NOT NULL, BusinessUnitName citext NOT NULL, AssignmentCompletion int NULL, AssignmentsCount int NOT NULL, AffectDisciplineAssignmentsCount int NOT NULL, CompletedInTimeAssignmentsCount int NOT NULL, OverdueAssignmentsCount int NOT NULL )

query.default: select Department, Unwrap, DepartmentName, IsActiveDepartment, SubDepartmentName, IsActiveSubDepartment, HyperlinkBusinessUnitId, BusinessUnitName, AssignmentCompletion, AssignmentsCount, AffectDisciplineAssignmentsCount, CompletedInTimeAssignmentsCount, OverdueAssignmentsCount from Sungero_Reports_DepAsgCompletion where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by RowIndex;
